title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same generate/chat/embed API surface as Python.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap Ollama models into chains, agents, and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, multi-user workspaces, and RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, streaming, and utilities for Spring Boot integration.

title: ollama-cli-copilot
summary: Rust-based CLI copilot that wraps Ollama for inline shell suggestions, explanations, and script generation.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Template repo showing how to build a RAG pipeline with Ollama embeddings, Chroma, and Streamlit in ~100 lines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook of recipes: fine-tune, quantize, deploy on Jetson/Raspberry Pi, and build voice bots.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-affinity and autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Tauri desktop app for macOS/Windows/Linux to chat with local Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama REST API with native async/await and nimble package distribution.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features in pipelines.

title: ollama-c#
summary: .NET client library for Ollama with strongly-typed models, dependency-injection helpers, and Blazor sample.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama’s REST API plus tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a “Ask Ollama” command to summarize notes, brainstorm, or Q&A inside your vault.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve example deploying Ollama models across a GPU cluster with autoscaling and batching.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama with idiomatic contexts and streaming support; used internally by ollama CLI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production-grade search pipelines.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Community repo of ready-to-run Docker Compose stacks bundling Ollama with WebUI, Chroma, qDrant, or Open-WebUI.
